CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 3, 1962, pg. A14, reads: "HOMESTEAD'S GLC CLUB - Members of he GLC Club of Homestead which celebrated its 50th anniversary last Friday night at Clark Memorial Baptist Church, are seated left to right: Mmes. David Bradley, Leroy Hightower, James Johnson, Edith Betts, William Green, Alex Murray, charter members, Raymond Virdier and George King; Shelton Cephas, James Brown, Robert Bolden and Marie Sanders. Standing in same order: Mmes. John Floyd, James Pridgeon, Walter Harris, Edmund Jefferson Jr., Charles Brooks, King Lindsay, president; John Adkins, Walter Bell, Ralph Jackson, Fred Wilson, Wylie Berry, James Porter, Augusta Patterson and Matthew Carlisle. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of twenty six women wearing light colored corsages, including: Mrs. David Bradley, Mrs. Leroy Hightower, Mrs. James Johnson, Edith Betts, Mrs. William Green, Mrs. Alex Murray, Mrs. Raymond Virdier, Mrs. George King, Mrs. Shelton Cephas, Mrs. James Brown, Mrs. Robert Bolden, Mrs. Marie Sanders, Mrs. John Floyd, Mrs. James Pridgeon, Mrs. Walter Harris, Mrs. Edmund Jefferson Jr., Mrs. Charles Brooks, Mrs. King Lindsay, Mrs. John Adkins, Mrs. Walter Bell, Mrs. Ralph Jackson, Mrs. Fred Wilson, Mrs. Wylie Berry, Mrs. James Porter, Augusta Patterson, and Mrs. Matthew Carlisle, posed in front of banner inscribed "G.L.C. Club, Homestead, Pennsylvania, organized 1912", in Clark Memorial Baptist Church
